mapper.insert: insert into supporters_apply(num, supporters_name, applicant_id, state, target, apply_date, start_date, end_date, join_num) values(suapply_seq.nextval, #{supportersname}, #{applicantid}, 0, 0, sysdate, to_date(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{joinnum})
mapper.select: select count(*) from supporters_apply where join_num=#{num} and applicant_id=#{loginId} and state=0
mapper.update: update supporters_apply set state = 1 where join_num=#{num} and applicant_id=#{loginId} and state=0
